Thermos Bottle: A smart thermos bottle that tracks the temperature of your beverage and alerts you when it's time to refill. It also has a built-in strainer for tea or coffee.
Thermos Lunchbox: A lunchbox that keeps your food warm and fresh throughout the day. It also has compartments for different types of food, such as a salad and a sandwich.

Thermos Water Bottle: A water bottle that keeps your water at the perfect temperature, whether you prefer it hot or cold. It also has a built-in filter to ensure that the water is always clean and safe to drink.
Thermos Coffee Mug: A coffee mug that keeps your coffee warm for hours. It also has a built-in lid with a built-in strainer, so you can easily sip your coffee without any spills.
Thermos Tea Infuser: A tea infuser that keeps your tea leaves fresh and aromatic. It also has a built-in strainer, so you can easily remove the tea leaves once you're done drinking your tea.
